mapper.sql: id, task_id, cur_time, biz_type, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customer_id, customer_name, temperature_type_code, pallet_num, creator, creator_id, create_time, write_time, rowExcelNo, rowExcelName
task_id, cur_time, biz_type, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customer_id, customer_name, temperature_type_code, pallet_num, creator, creator_id, create_time, write_time, rowExcelNo, rowExcelName
mapper.select: select a.cur_time, a.warehouse_code, a.warehouse_name, a.customer_name, a.customer_id,a.temperature_type_code,a.rowExcelNo,a.rowExcelName, a.biz_type,b.pallet_num as oldPalletNum,b.sys_pallet_num as oldSysPalletNum, a.pallet_num as palletNum,a.sys_pallet_num as sysPalletNum from biz_pallet_info_temp a inner join biz_pallet_info b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id and a.cur_time = b.cur_time and a.warehouse_code = b.warehouse_code and IFNULL(a.temperature_type_code,'') = IFNULL(b.temperature_type_code,'') where 1=1 and b.del_flag=0 and a.task_id=#{taskId} limit #{errorNum}

select a.cur_time, a.warehouse_code, a.warehouse_name, a.customer_name, a.customer_id,a.temperature_type_code,a.rowExcelNo,a.rowExcelName, a.biz_type,b.pallet_num as oldPalletNum,b.sys_pallet_num as oldSysPalletNum, a.pallet_num as palletNum,a.sys_pallet_num as sysPalletNum from biz_pallet_info_temp a inner join biz_pallet_info b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id and a.cur_time = b.cur_time and a.warehouse_code = b.warehouse_code and IFNULL(a.temperature_type_code,'') = IFNULL(b.temperature_type_code,'') where 1=1 and b.del_flag=0 and a.task_id=#{taskId}

select
from biz_pallet_info_temp WHERE task_id=#{taskId} and CONCAT(IFNULL(cur_time,''),IFNULL(warehouse_code,''),IFNULL(customer_id,''),IFNULL(temperature_type_code,''),IFNULL(biz_type,'')) not in (select CONCAT(IFNULL(cur_time,''),IFNULL(warehouse_code,''),IFNULL(customer_id,''),IFNULL(temperature_type_code,''),IFNULL(biz_type,'')) from biz_pallet_info WHERE del_flag='0')
mapper.insert:
insert into biz_pallet_info_temp( task_id, cur_time, biz_type, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customer_id, customer_name, temperature_type_code, pallet_num, creator, creator_id, create_time, write_time, rowExcelNo, rowExcelName ) values
( #{item.taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.curTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.bizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.temperatureTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.palletNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.writeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.rowExcelNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.rowExcelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update biz_pallet_info_temp
task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cur_time = #{curTime,jdbcType=DATE},
biz_type = #{bizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warehouse_code = #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warehouse_name = #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temperature_type_code = #{temperatureTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pallet_num = #{palletNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
write_time = #{writeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rowExcelNo = #{rowExcelNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rowExcelName = #{rowExcelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into biz_pallet_info(cur_time, biz_type,warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customer_id, customer_name, temperature_type_code, pallet_num, is_calculated, creator, creator_id, create_time, del_flag, write_time, sys_pallet_num, charge_source) select cur_time, biz_type, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customer_id, customer_name, temperature_type_code, pallet_num, '0', creator, creator_id, create_time, '0', write_time, sys_pallet_num, charge_source from biz_pallet_info_temp where task_id=#{taskId}

insert into biz_pallet_info( cur_time, biz_type,warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customer_id, customer_name, temperature_type_code, pallet_num, is_calculated, creator, creator_id, create_time, del_flag, write_time, sys_pallet_num, charge_source ) values (
#{curTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperatureTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{palletNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, '0', #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '0', #{writeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 0, 'import' )
